name: Explore the Ohrid Old Town and Lake
description: Discover the UNESCO World Heritage site of Ohrid, known for its picturesque lake, ancient churches, and historic architecture.

name: Visit Skopje's Old Bazaar
description: Stroll through the Old Bazaar in Skopje, a bustling market offering a mix of history, culture, and local crafts.

name: Hiking in Mavrovo National Park
description: Enjoy the natural beauty of Mavrovo National Park, featuring stunning landscapes ideal for hiking and outdoor activities.

name: Matka Canyon Adventure
description: Explore the Matka Canyon near Skopje, a popular spot for hiking, boating, and enjoying the serene natural environment.

name: Bitola's Shirok Sokak Street
description: Walk down Shirok Sokak Street in Bitola, known for its vibrant atmosphere, historic buildings, and cafes.

name: Heraclea Lyncestis Visit
description: Discover the ancient ruins of Heraclea Lyncestis near Bitola, featuring well-preserved mosaics and historical significance.

name: Wine Tasting in Tikveš Region
description: Experience wine tasting in the Tikveš wine region, known for its high-quality wines and beautiful vineyards.

name: Visit Saint Naum Monastery
description: Explore the historic Saint Naum Monastery, located on the shores of Lake Ohrid, known for its stunning architecture and spiritual significance.

name: Kokino Observatory Experience
description: Visit the ancient Kokino Observatory, recognized by NASA as one of the oldest observatories in the world, offering a unique historical perspective.

name: Stobi Archaeological Site
description: Discover the ancient city of Stobi, a significant archaeological site with well-preserved Roman and Byzantine ruins.
